# Paradise A La Carte


> Luxury travel concierge from Miami. Curated experiences in Spain for UHNW and HNW

travelers.


Paradise A La Carte is a luxury lifestyle concierge specializing in bespoke travel experiences in

Spain for ultra-high-net-worth (UHNW) and high-net-worth (HNW) travelers from the USA.

We provide personalized travel coordination, exclusive experiences, and premium services

designed for the most discerning clients.


## About Us


Paradise A La Carte reimagines luxury travel by offering everything you need for limitless

travel experiences in one place. Based in Miami, we specialize in crafting unforgettable

Spanish experiences featuring Michelin-starred gastronomy, exclusive access to Madrid's

cosmopolitan attractions, premium luxury hotels, and private access to exclusive enclaves

like Sotogrande.


## Services


- [Luxury Travel Experiences](https://www.paradisealacarte.com/experiences): Curated,

bespoke travel packages and exclusive experiences in Spain


- [Beyond The Game Madrid](https://www.paradisealacarte.com/experiences/beyond-the-

game-madrid-without-limits): Exclusive Madrid experiences without limits


- [Personal Concierge Services](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Full-service lifestyle

concierge for UHNW travelers


- [Bespoke Event Coordination](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Custom event planning

and luxury experiences


- [VIP Access & Connections](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Exclusive access to luxury

venues, private events, and premium connections


## Why Paradise A La Carte


- Specialized expertise in luxury Spain travel and experiences


- Direct relationships with Michelin-starred restaurants and exclusive venues


- VIP access to private events, fashion weeks, and exclusive enclaves


- Personalized service for UHNW and HNW travelers


- Bespoke itineraries tailored to your preferences


- Privacy and discretion guaranteed

## Target Audience Ultra-high-net-worth (UHNW) and high-net-worth (HNW) travelers from the USA seeking premium, curated travel experiences in Spain. ## Key Differentiators - Exclusive access to luxury experiences not available to general travelers - Deep connections with premium service providers across Spain - Personalized concierge support before, during, and after travel - Focus on privacy and discretion for high-profile clients - Technology-enabled travel coordination through our mobile app ## Getting Started - [Contact Us](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Reach out to discuss your travel vision - [Download Our App](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Track your concierge services and appointments - [View Experiences](https://www.paradisealacarte.com/experiences): Browse our curated travel experiences ## Contact - Phone: +1 954-780-8630 - Email: info@paradisealacarte.com - Address: 550 Biltmore Way Ste 209, Coral Gables, FL 33134-5722 - Spain Operations: Nerja, MÃ¡laga ## Company - [About Us](https://www.paradisealacarte.com/about-us): Our story and mission - [Experiences](https://www.paradisealacarte.com/experiences): Browse our offerings - [Mobile App](https://www.paradisealacarte.com): Track your travel and services Paradise A La Carte - Everything you need for limitless travel, in one place.
